## Install

<<<<<<< HEAD

=======
```sh
$ npm install --save is-path-cwd
>>>>>>> 37d774246a886414ad3dcaef6f0d5ef6c08bf9d8
```


## Usage

```js
<<<<<<< HEAD
const isPathCwd = require('is-path-cwd');
=======
var isPathCwd = require('is-path-cwd');
>>>>>>> 37d774246a886414ad3dcaef6f0d5ef6c08bf9d8

isPathCwd(process.cwd());
//=> true

isPathCwd('unicorn');
//=> false
```
